<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Megavolt](/Feats.aspx?ID=3062) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Electricity" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=56" />
<trait label="Inventor" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=408" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 27</row>

</column>

---

You bleed off some electric power from your innovation in the shape of a damaging bolt. Creatures in a 20-foot line from your innovation take 3d4 electricity damage, with a [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save against your class DC. The electricity damage increases by 1d4 at 8th level and every 2 levels thereafter.

 **Unstable Function** You overload and supercharge the voltage even higher. Add the [unstable](/Traits.aspx?ID=416) trait to Megavolt. The area increases to a 60-foot line and the damage increases from d4s to d12s.

 If you have the breakthrough innovation class feature, you can choose a 60-foot or 90-foot line for the area when you use an unstable Megavolt; if you also have the revolutionary innovation class feature, you can choose a 60-foot, 90-foot, or 120-foot line.

**Special** If your innovation is a [minion](/Traits.aspx?ID=109), it can take this action rather than you.

<title level="2">Megavolt leads to...</title>
[Gigavolt](/Feats.aspx?ID=3076)
name: Megavolt
